API Collection# Core Video Image Format Errors

## [Topics](/documentation/Accelerate/1498271-core-video-image-format-errors#topics)

### [Type Aliases](/documentation/Accelerate/1498271-core-video-image-format-errors#Type-Aliases)

[`typealias vImageCVImageFormatError`](/documentation/accelerate/vimagecvimageformaterror)Additional error codes for functions that use the vImageCVImageFormatRef### [Constants](/documentation/Accelerate/1498271-core-video-image-format-errors#Constants)

[`var kvImageCVImageFormat_NoError: Int`](/documentation/accelerate/kvimagecvimageformat_noerror)An error code that indicates the conversion completed without error.[`var kvImageCVImageFormat_ConversionMatrix: Int`](/documentation/accelerate/kvimagecvimageformat_conversionmatrix)An error code that indicates the required conversion matrix is absent.[`var kvImageCVImageFormat_ChromaSiting: Int`](/documentation/accelerate/kvimagecvimageformat_chromasiting)An error code that indicates the chroma siting information is absent.[`var kvImageCVImageFormat_ColorSpace: Int`](/documentation/accelerate/kvimagecvimageformat_colorspace)An error code that indicates the image’s color space is missing.[`var kvImageCVImageFormat_VideoChannelDescription: Int`](/documentation/accelerate/kvimagecvimageformat_videochanneldescription)An error code that indicates the range and clipping information is missing.[`var kvImageCVImageFormat_AlphaIsOneHint: Int`](/documentation/accelerate/kvimagecvimageformat_alphaisonehint)A hint that indicates the alpha channel is opaque.## [See Also](/documentation/Accelerate/1498271-core-video-image-format-errors#see-also)

### [Constants](/documentation/Accelerate/1498271-core-video-image-format-errors#Constants)

[Error codes](/documentation/accelerate/1578972-error-codes)Error codes that vImage functions return when an operation fails.[Processing Flags](/documentation/accelerate/1578976-processing-flags)Set flags on vImage operations to specify processing options.[Dithering Methods](/documentation/accelerate/1533233-dithering-methods)Specify the dithering method some vImage conversion functions use.[Availability Flags](/documentation/accelerate/availability-flags)Obtain the availability of particular vImage features.[Decode Arrays](/documentation/accelerate/decode-arrays)Specify the decode array constant to use with 16Q12-formatted data.[Buffer Types](/documentation/accelerate/buffer-types)Look up buffer type codes vImage conversions provide.[`typealias vImageMatrixType`](/documentation/accelerate/vimagematrixtype)An enumeration of RGB -> Y’CbCr conversion matrix types.[`typealias vImage_WarpInterpolation`](/documentation/accelerate/vimage_warpinterpolation)Constants for selecting the interpolation mode
